Hipster briefs in ribbed microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Lace push-up body with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and a string at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck at the front and double, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in the side and a flared, asymmetric skirt.  Lined.
